title: Flag Suspicious Activity for SAR Filing
description: A compliance analyst identifies a series of unusual transactions that may require filing a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR).

tasks.description: Investigate a transaction monitoring alert for a corporate account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews an alert showing multiple large, structured cash deposits.

tasks.description: Gather all related transaction data and customer information for the investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a case file with all relevant details.

tasks.description: Escalate the case to a senior analyst with a recommendation to file a SAR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent escalates the case and documents the reason for the SAR recommendation.
